title: The Umbrella Trick
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 685 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 480L, Fiction Series
description: Snubby Nose and Grandpa Grizzly play a trick on the other Hoppers. They give them little umbrellas that are really pens. The Hoppers get wet, and this makes them angry. Grandpa Grizzly buys all the bunnies little silk umbrellas so they don't get wet.
